    • Method Detail

      • atoi

        public static int atoi(java.lang.String str)

        Convert a given string to integer.

        1. Validate that the string only contains digits or (, +, -) signs.
        2. If the string starts with '.' then it is immaterial value; break wherever '.' is encountered.
        3. Ignore leading spaces.
        4. Handle overflow.
        5. Honor sign ('-' or '+'/empty).
        Parameters:
        str - input string
        Returns:
        output integer

      • findPermutations

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> findPermutations(java.lang.String s)

        Print all case-sensitive permutations of a string, without changing the positions of any characters.

        Problem Reference
        Parameters:
        s - string to introspect
        Returns:
        List of permutations, including the string itself
